bibl.title: An Astronomical Almanac.
bibl.note: P. Yale CtYBR inv. 3775. Small fragment, bought by A.E. Samuel in late 1964 or early 1965 in Cairo. Provenance unknown, AD IIIin. There is no good basis for identifying the precise part of the almanac. - Pp. 59-60: General remarks on sign-entry almanacs and horoscopes.

bibl.title: Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno.

bibl.seg: Diletta Minutoli (a cura di), Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno (P.Pintaudi) (Firenze, 2012) pp. 56-60 et pl. V.

P. Yale CtYBR inv. 3775. Small fragment, bought by A.E. Samuel in late 1964 or early 1965 in Cairo. Provenance unknown, AD IIIin. There is no good basis for identifying the precise part of the almanac. - Pp. 59-60: General remarks on sign-entry almanacs and horoscopes.
